1.title: Episode 1
1.plot: Jagadamba's grandmother suffers from a heart attack and wishes to see Balaraju married before her death, the heart attack turns out to be fake. Though initially reluctant, Balaraju later agrees to the wedding after seeing the girl. Later, Jagadamba and Varun have problems in their married life and are heading towards a divorce.

2.title: Episode 2
2.plot: The families of Apsara and Balaraju meet. Varun and Jagadamba come to an agreement about their divorce and then reach the village. There is a twist in the tale when Apsara is seen talking to someone about stopping the wedding.

3.title: Episode 3
3.plot: Jaggu and Varun keep on fighting. Krishna finds that Apsara wants to stop the wedding and is confused about what to do meanwhile Varun and Jagadamba also find out about Apsara's intention and they decide to help Balaraju.

4.title: Episode 4
4.plot: Varun, Jagadamba, and Krishna join as a team and help Balaraju. They tell Balaraju that making the girl fall in love with him is the actual win in anybody. Meanwhile, everyone gets to know that grandmother faked the heart attack and confront her. Balaraju tries to impress the girl and in the end, the girl herself proposes to him.

5.title: Episode 5
5.plot: The boys get together for a village style bachelor party. Shobhan's true colors are revealed while Varun finds a small ray of hope in his relationship with Jaggu.

6.title: Episode 6
6.plot: The family gathers for sangeet celebration. Divya interrupts while Jaggu tries to express her love for Varun.

7.title: Episode 7
7.plot: Shoban plans to kidnap Apsara and asks her to be ready, while Varun notices their secret conversation and tries to tell the same to Jagadamba, which leads to a fight.

8.title: Episode 8
8.plot:

13.title: Episode 13
13.plot: While Jaggu finds a suitor, the lawyers come in with the divorce papers. She is forced to perform a ritual which requires her to have a partner, this upsets Jaggu further who runs to Varun.

12.title: Episode 12
12.plot: Family meets a lawyer and a priest for Varun-Jaggu's divorce and Balraju's wedding. Varun asks Jaggu to go ahead with her life and signs the divorce papers. Varun accidentally meets a person who introduces himself as Jaggu's would-be.

13.title: Episode 13
13.plot: While Jaggu finds a suitor, the lawyers come in with the divorce papers. She is forced to perform a ritual which requires her to have a partner, this upsets Jaggu further who runs to Varun.

imdb.plot outline: Varun and Jaggu return as a married couple on a mission to save Balaraju's wedding- while there is trouble brewing in their own marriage Varun and Jagadamba are married and have been living together for over a year now in Hyderabad. Like every marriage, their relationship also goes through a lot of ups and downs. Their fights are hilariously cute and give us a sense of a young couple who are in love but due to their ego and misunderstandings start turning small things into a big deal. Slowly distance between them increases and things get serious to the extent that Jagadamba wants to file for a divorce. Varun is surprised to hear this and feels that little things should be ignored and they should move on. However, Jagadamba is not willing to hear him out. She wants to go to Amalapuram, call both families to explain their situation and file for a divorce. At Amalapuram, family members are gathered and just when Varun and Jagadamba are about to talk about their divorce, the couple learns that Balaraju's wedding is arranged with Manasa, a beautiful girl from a neighboring town who he meets at Suresh Krishnan's daughters wedding. Suresh Krishnan is a businessman and owns a chain of Hospitals in the Eastern part of Andhra Pradesh. Now, Varun and Jagadamba find it inappropriate to talk about their personal issue while everyone is happy and elated about the good news. They decide to wait until the wedding is over to tell everyone. While the wedding preparations are going on full swing, Jagadamba finds out that Manasa is in love with a wedding videographer from Rajahmundry. Jagadamba also notices that Balaraju is madly in love with Manasa and does not want to see his heart broken once again. Jagadamba decides to seek Varun's help to change Manasa's choice and convince her to marry Balaraju. The week before the wedding is full of festivities and packed with fun-filled ceremonies. The boys- Varun, Krishna, Nitin (Varun's friend who is visiting from Hyderabad), decide to throw a bachelor party in Peddapuram for Balaraju. Peddapuram is known as a guys hideout for small towner's and they decide to have one last night of fun and frolic before Balaraju's wedding. While the boys are gone, a group of people arrives at the marriage house to kidnap the bride. The group mistakenly kidnaps Jagadamba instead of Manasa. While there are just a few days remaining for the wedding, Varun, Balaraju and the boys head out to look for Jagadamba and promise everyone to come back before the muhurtham. Jagadamba is kidnapped by the Videographer as he mistakes her for Manasa. While being captive, Jagadamba finds out that the Videographers is not really serious about marrying Manasa but does this in an attempt to get his past revenge with Balaraju. Now Jagadamba after learning his true colors is all the more determined to ensure Balaraju and Manasa get married. As a team Varun, Balaraju, Krishna device a plan to make Manasa realize Balaraju's worth an also show her the videographers' true colors. Amidst all the fun and chaos of this wedding, Varun and Jagadamba realizes that if they can go to any extent to unite a couple and save a wedding then why aren't they making an effort to save their own marriage. They take a leap towards getting the spark back in their marriage; Balaraju and Manasa get married and another season of Pelli Gola reaches a happy ending.
imdb.title: Pelli Gola 2
